description: Bruno & Shane:  Superstar Bruno didn't have much to say to wanderer Shane when they met up in the Oregon countryside-at least not in words.  But he uses lots of body language as he gets down to the nitty gritty with Shane.  The taut-bodied young drifter takes the mighty Latin stud's thick meat standing up, lying, on a ladder and across the tailgate of a pickup.  Cascades of cum climax this classic scorcher!
title: Hayride
